backend_url.description: ipv6 url to directly access your runner

access_url.description: Url to set up your account and then login into your webrunner

url.description: Url to access your runner once you set your account

ssh_command.description: SSH command used to access your runner in ssh when you provided a ssh public key

monitor_url.description: Url to access the monitoring interface of your instance. Use this url to get the recovery code needed to set up your runner

webdav_url.description: Url for webdav access of your runner it access the root of your runner. Same users as the one for the runner

public_url.description: Url of the public folder of your runner

git_private_url.description: Private url for your repositories. You can use it to push.
